name: Edinborough Cheese Sauce
description: Convenient addition to your hassle-free meals and snacks. This irresistible sauce is a great way to bring the family together. Try this Cheese Sauce as a creamy nacho cheese, a savoury cheese sauce or a cheese dip sauce. It is also great to use for pasta, homemade mac and cheese, hot dogs or tacos.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
